name: Memory (itch) (ClaireNicolee)
description:
Here's a sad fact: The more you think over a memory, the faster you forget it. Each time your brain is encoding over its previous storage of that memory with a new narrative, and the details get lost over time.

This game was developed over four months with the intention of creating a serious game. We wanted to explore this feeling of pieces slipping away over time. What you were once fond of no longer within your reach.

Memory was developed by myself, Brian Maynard, Tim Chen, and Griffin Ochar.
